metadata.description: THIS IS WHERE IT ALL BEGAN… Before he was Master Chief, he was John -- a boy stolen from his parents and conscripted into the SPARTAN II program on the fortress world of Reach. These are desperate times in the human colonies, with galactic civil war just a heartbeat away...and only Dr. Catherine Halsey understands the terrible price humanity must pay to keep from destroying itself. Brian Reed and Felix Ruiz bring you an adaptation of the best-selling novel HALO: FALL OF REACH by Eric Nylund.
metadata.name: Halo: Fall of Reach
